text: Parsing XML to a hash table
I have an XML file in the following format:

code:
<doc>
<id name="X">
  <type name="A">
    <min val="100" id="80"/>
    <max val="200" id="90"/>
   </type>
  <type name="B">
    <min val="100" id="20"/>
    <max val="20" id="90"/>
  </type>
</id>

<type...>
</type>
</doc>

text: I would like to parse this document and build a hash table
How would I do this in Python?
